column1:
Castaway Day 1
Washed up on an unknown island...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 2
Gonna trap some food tonight...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Nothing but nature for miles...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

You got 1 Legend Trap!

You got 1 Cat Ticket!

Food search complete!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 7
Hunger makes everything look good...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 8
Even muddy water tastes good...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 9
A bottle with "help" in it washed up.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 10
Something is caught in my trap!
You got 1 Rare Ticket!

Castaway Day 11
Need to search the whole island.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 12
The night isn't so scary anymore.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 13
The rising sun is so beautiful.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 14
Living on a desert island isn't so bad...
You got 1 Legend Trap!
